Title: Escape Machines

Release Date: Apr 14, 2015

Visit the website View update history Read related news View discussions Find Community Groups
Share Embed  

Early Access Game

Get instant access and start playing; get involved with this game as it develops.

Note: This Early Access game is not complete and may or may not change further. If you are not excited to play this game in its current state, then you should wait to see if the game progresses further in development. Learn more

What the developers have to say:

Why Early Access?

“We want to build a community around Escape Machines, help us shape the game, especially the multi-player. We want to know what you like, love and what you don't like.
Help us make Escape Machines the best game it can be!”

Approximately how long will this game be in Early Access?

“We estimate that Escape Machines will be in Early Access for around 6 months approximately.”

How is the full version planned to differ from the Early Access version?

“The early access version of Escape Machines will be constantly evolving, new weapons, armours and items will be added, new areas, environments and game modes. We are currently working on polishing the current features up and will be adding more over the next few months, soon you will be able to play with your friends, build robots, customize them, and command them into battle!”

What is the current state of the Early Access version?

“The current game build is completely stable.”

Will the game be priced differently during and after Early Access?

“While Escape Machines is in Early Access, it will be at a reduced rate.”

How are you planning on involving the Community in your development process?

“We will ask for your feedback, we want to know what you like and don't like about Escape Machines, we'll be hosting screen shot competitions.”
Read more

About This Game

Escape Machines is an addictive Science Fiction single/multi-player/co-op adventure shooter in the near future!
Artificial intellect and robots fight against their creators. You must take control of the robots and save people.

The game is currently in early beta, some features may be unfinished.

Features:

  • Play with friends in co-op and VS multi-player.*Currently unavailable*
  • Build robots and command them to win in battle.
  • Upgrade your weapons and armour.
  • Battle huge robot bosses.
  • Use vehicles to travel, add turrets to your vehicles.
  • Customize your armour, weapons and stats. Buy/upgrade equipment in the 'Armourer shop'

  • Level editor - create levels, share and play them with friends.
  • Original soundtrack/SFX ~ bit-music mixed with progressive trance and electro-funk.
READ MORE

System Requirements

    Minimum:
    • OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/8
    • Processor: 2.5 GHz
    • Memory: 1 GB RAM
    • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 Compatible
    • DirectX: Version 9.0
    • Hard Drive: 550 MB available space
    • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound

Posted: August 24
Early Access Review
The game promised to have tons of upgrades within 6 months but it hasn't updated for quite some time. It's extremely generic, has no variation in enemies, and rather boring. On the bright side, I bought it for only 19 cents. It's not like it could get worse.

Also, don't try reporting bugs to the developer. Their forums are just full of malware and fake accounts.

Early Access Review
To anyone considering buying this, its been confirmed its switching to unreal engine 4.

http://mintagestudios.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=4&t=9

I would recommend buying a copy of this now before the price goes up as it likely will when the engine changes. Whats there now is ok, kind of fun arcade game. This could well turn into a great game of which its genre is seriously lacking in choices, arcade style rpg with coop the closest good game like that i know of is alien swarm for free here on steam.
